articles.description: The Pakistan Super League is considering postponing the remainder of its season amid the ongoing tensions between India and Pakistan.
articles.title: Pakistan Super League: Organisers considering postponing the remainder of season amid India-Pakistan tensions

articles.description: Northampton's 20-year-old flanker Henry Pollock is included in a 38-strong British and Irish Lions squad to tour Australia.
articles.title: Henry Pollock makes British and Irish Lions squad as Owen Farrell misses out

articles.description: The Champions League final will not feature an English, German or Spanish side for the first time in 21 years.
articles.title: Champions League: How Paris St-Germain & Inter Milan reached final

articles.description: Senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel examines Arsenal's summer transfer plans after their Champions League exit.
articles.title: Arsenal transfer plans: Isak, Gyokeres and Zubimendi on list

articles.description: Somerset batter James Rew replaces the injured Jordan Cox in the England squad for their Test against Zimbabwe later this month.
articles.title: James Rew replaces injured Jordan Cox in England squad for Zimbabwe Test

articles.description: Cold, windy and an artificial pitch - what awaits Tottenham at Bodo/Glimt's stadium, which is located 200km north of the Arctic Circle.
articles.title: Bodo/Glimt vs Tottenham: What awaits Spurs in Norway for Europa League semi-final second leg

articles.description: The clock is ticking for Arsenal and manager Mikel Arteta to show they can be winners after Champions League exit to PSG, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal still a nearly team after PSG end Champions league dream

articles.description: Defending champion Iga Swiatek cruises through to the Italian Open third round with a straight-set win over Elisabetta Cocciaretto.
articles.title: Italian Open: Iga Swiatek beats Elisabetta Cocciaretto to reach third round

articles.description: The New York Knicks produce another stunning comeback to win the second game of their NBA Conference play-off semi-final with the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Second New York Knicks comeback leaves Boston Celtics hanging on

articles.description: Scotland slumped to a disappointing 97-run defeat to the United Arab Emirates, damaging their faltering defence of the World Cup League 2 crown.
articles.title: WCL2: Scotland suffer heavy defeat to UAE
